us-gaap:pensionandotherpostretirementpla.D20210101-20211231: 401(k) Defined Contribution PlanWe adopted the Alarm.com Holdings 401(k) Plan, or the Plan, on April 30, 2009. All of our employees are eligible to participate in the Plan. For the years ended December 31, 2021 and 2020, our discretionary match was 100% of employee contributions up to 10% of salary and up to a $5,000 maximum match. For the year ended December 31, 2019, our discretionary match was 100% of employee contributions up to 10% of salary and up to a $4,000 maximum match.
